alert.note: Alert for Florence; Georgetown; Horry; Marion; Williamsburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 11 at 3:22PM EDT until August 11 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Florence County in northeastern South Carolina... Georgetown County in northeastern South Carolina... Horry County in northeastern South Carolina... Marion County in northeastern South Carolina... Northeastern Williamsburg County in northeastern South Carolina... * Until 415 PM EDT. * At 322 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Sampit, or 9 miles west of Georgetown, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Myrtle Beach, Conway, North Myrtle Beach, Georgetown, Marion, DeBordieu Colony, Mullins, Surfside Beach, Pawleys Island, Myrtle Beach Airport, Little River, Yawkey South Island, Murrells Inlet, Little River Entrance, Winyah Bay Entrance, Socastee, Red Hill, Springmaid Pier, Garden City, and North Myrtle Beach Airport. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
